name: PARTY_PROXY
title: PARTY_PROXY
description: Abstract concept of a proxy description of a party, including an optional link to data for this party in a demographic or other identity management system. Sub- typed into `PARTY_IDENTIFIED` and `PARTY_SELF`.

element.short: Abstract concept of a proxy description of a party, including an optional link to data for this party in a demographic or other identity management system.
element.definition: Abstract concept of a proxy description of a party, including an optional link to data for this party in a demographic or other identity management system. Sub- typed into `PARTY_IDENTIFIED` and `PARTY_SELF`.

element.short: Optional reference to more detailed demographic or identification information for this party, in an external system.
element.definition: Optional reference to more detailed demographic or identification information for this party, in an external system.
